page.title: 07VILLAGE SHOPS (2).
page.content: {The Village Post Office} is also a General Store selling a wide range of goods from fresh food to tools and toys. The post office has been in the present building for 17 years but several other buildings in the village have been the post office in the past. The present owners have been the village postmasters for five years. F.Mellor and Son Family Butchers was started by the present owners grandfather. The present owner Fred Mellor and his father work in the shop and the family also carry out van deliveries in surrounding villages. The present owners no longer make traditional meat products on the premises.
